invalid.format: {property} with value '{value}' is not a valid array of '{type}'
invalid.duplicate: {property} with value '{value}' is not a valid array, it contains duplicate values
invalid.not_empty: {property} is not a valid array, it must not be empty

invalid.format: {property} with value '{value}' is not a valid boolean

invalid.outbound: '{date}' is not a valid birth date, it must be at least 13 years ago and at most 100

invalid.format: {property} with value '{value}' is not a valid date
{property} with value '{value}' is not a valid email
invalid.blacklisted: {property} with value '{value}' is a blacklisted email
invalid.size: Email '{email}' is either too long (>60) or too short (<6)

not_found.on_disk: File '{filename}' cannot be found on disk

invalid.unauthorized_mime_type: File has an unauthorized mime type, valid mime types are ['{mime_types}']

invalid.not_found: File visibility group with name '{name}' not found

invalid.format: {property} with value '{value}' is not a valid gender, valid genders are ['{genders}']
{property} with value '{value}' is not a valid ID, it must be a valid string number or a number
invalid.min: {property} with value '{value}' is not a valid ID, it must be greater than or equal to {min}

invalid.format: {property} with values in ['{value}'] is not a valid IDs array, it must be an array of valid string numbers and/or numbers
{property} with value '{value}' is not a valid string number or number
invalid.min: {property} with value '{value}' is not a valid number, it must be greater than or equal to {min}

invalid.weak: {property} with value '{value}' is not a valid password, it must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one number, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter and one special character

invalid.format: {property} with value '{value}' is not a valid permission, valid permissions are: ['{permissions}']

permission.not_found: Permission with ID '{id}' not found on user '{name}'

invalid.format: {property} with value '{value}' is not a valid phone number, it must start with a '+' followed by a country code and contain only numbers

invalid.no_logo: Promotion with number '{number}' has no logo

invalid.format: {property} with value '{value}' is not a valid string
invalid.uppercase: {property} with value '{value}' is not a valid string, it must be uppercase

invalid.unknown: An unknown error occurred while verifying token

invalid.not_in_file_visibility_group: User is not in file visibility group '{group_name}'

user.cannot_update: You cannot update your own birth date or name, ask another user with the appropriate permission

picture.cooldown: You can only change your picture once every {days} days
